answers.answer: Medication adjustments is something you need to discuss with your doctor, not on health forums. Increasing or decreasing prescribed medication/s without your doctors consent can lead to serious health issues.

question: I am taking 20 units of Insulin (Human 30/70),Glycephage 1 gm SR,Dimicron XR60- all twice daily. My fasting Blood Sugar is 120 and PP after 2 Hrs is 190. Should I increase my medication.
title: diabetes
